CustomField.description: Visual gauge of physician expenses relative to state spending limit
CustomField.formula:
IF(State_Expense_Limit__c > 0 && Per_State_Rule__r.Active__c = true && (YTD_Expenses__c < (State_Expense_Limit__c*0.17)), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0154W00000CMt8x","1-16% of Spend"),
IF(State_Expense_Limit__c > 0 && Per_State_Rule__r.Active__c = true &&(YTD_Expenses__c >= (State_Expense_Limit__c*0.17) && YTD_Expenses__c < (State_Expense_Limit__c*0.33)), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0154W00000CMt8y","17-32% of Spend"),
IF(State_Expense_Limit__c > 0 && Per_State_Rule__r.Active__c = true &&(YTD_Expenses__c >= (State_Expense_Limit__c*0.33) && YTD_Expenses__c < (State_Expense_Limit__c*0.50)), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0154W00000CMt8z","33-49% of Spend"),
IF(State_Expense_Limit__c > 0 && Per_State_Rule__r.Active__c = true &&(YTD_Expenses__c >= (State_Expense_Limit__c*0.50) && YTD_Expenses__c < (State_Expense_Limit__c*0.67)), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0154W00000CMt90","50-66% of Spend"),
IF(State_Expense_Limit__c > 0 && Per_State_Rule__r.Active__c = true &&(YTD_Expenses__c >= (State_Expense_Limit__c*0.67) && YTD_Expenses__c < (State_Expense_Limit__c*0.83)), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0154W00000CMt91","67-82% of Spend"),
IF(State_Expense_Limit__c > 0 && Per_State_Rule__r.Active__c = true &&(YTD_Expenses__c >= (State_Expense_Limit__c*0.83)), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0154W00000CMt92","83% or MORE of Spend"),
IF( Per_State_Rule__c = "", "", "") ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Expenses
